pkgmetadata.longdescription: Seamless Interface to Octave -- and Matlab // Direct interface to Octave. The primary goal is to facilitate the port of Matlab/Octave scripts to R. The package enables to call any Octave functions from R and as well as browsing their documentation, passing variables between R and Octave, using R core RNGs in Octave, which ensures that stochastic computations are also reproducible.
